basics.name: Kartik Puri
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a programming enthusiast and Oracle Certified Java SE 8 programmer. I enjoy working on projects that are challenging because while working on them I get to learn new concepts and new development techniques. 

 Status - Permanent Resident

work.summary: Working as full stack developer and developing a cloud-based platform to facilitate sharing health data within and across organizational boundaries with policy-based access control.
highlights: Write new code and maintain existing code in various programming languages such as Kotlin, Java, Python etc.
Develop REST APIs using Kotlin and Vert.x to manage the cloud-based platform.
Document application and framework code written in Kotlin, Vert.x and other programming languages.
Build product user interface using Vue.js and Vuetify to interact with cloud-based platform.
Write and run automated unit and integration tests in Mockk, Python, Jest and Cypress to ensure the product is working properly.

work.summary: Worked on XML parser to parse millions of records in a data pipeline.
highlights: Developed PySpark script to run on Amazon EMR cluster to load and save data to and from S3.
Parsing of XML data stored in files to a columnar format.
Validation of parsed XML data against Redshift Database for aggregated and one to one results using SQL queries and Pandas.

work.summary: Worked as a Web QA Developer to perform functional testing of the product.
highlights: Creating detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases aiming to test the functionality of the product.
Developed scripts for automated tests to ensure product quality using Python and Splinter (Selenium).

work.summary: Worked as a system administrator to ensure hughe availability of the servers.
highlights: Wrote Bash scripts for daily tasks.
Schedule of the jobs with crontab file.
Configuration and Administration of Logical Domains, virtual servers running on single hardware instance.
Management of cluster nodes running Oracle 10G and SAP services.
Debugging of server logs for any hardware or software failure.
Administration of individual services of cluster nodes to ensure high availability of servers.

work.summary: Worked as an Intern and performed Android Multimedia Testing on Set Top Boxes
highlights: Automation testing of multimedia ST Set Top Boxes.
Developed Android Media Player application to work with DLNA device.
Enhancements to the testing framework wrote in PERL.
Enhancements of the Android application used for testing multimedia.
